responses: Hello! I'm the hospital receptionist assistant. I can help with: doctor schedules, department info, lab report status, billing queries, registration info, hospital hours, and emergency contacts. How can I help you today?
You're welcome! Have a great day. Goodbye!

training_phrases: what are your hours,when are you open,hospital hours,opening time
where are you located,what is your address,directions,parking information
doctor availability,when is doctor available,doctor schedule,is doctor in today
billing information,costs,prices,how much does it cost
how to register,registration process,new patient,document requirements
responses: For new patient registration, please bring: 1) Government ID, 2) Insurance card (if any), 3) Previous medical records. Visit the registration desk on the ground floor. For follow-up visits, bring your patient ID card.
If this is life-threatening, call emergency services at 112 immediately and our emergency helpline at +91-XXXXXXXXXX. Please do that now.
I'm not sure I understand. I can help with: 1) Doctor schedules, 2) Department info, 3) Lab reports, 4) Billing queries. Which would you like? Or call +91-XXXXXXXXXX for immediate assistance.
